trans-unit.source: Learn how your company can evolve via digital transformation.
All rights reserved to Yuxi Global 2017
Overcome challenges and deadlines with our specialized personnel.
R&D and prototyping in IoT, Mobile, AR/VR-Simulation and Big Data.
Short-cycle MVP’s for rapid market validation and feature implementation.
UTC-5:00, direct flights, and a US-based support office.
Expertise in diverse languages, databases, and frameworks.

Innovation requires great minds working together. Our developers, quality analysts, and designers are ready to work with, complement, and boost our customers’ teams, letting them pursue more aggressive deadlines and overcome tricky obstacles.

Innovation is more than having a great software product. It requires you to constantly be on the lookout for new technologies, opportunities, and features to be implemented. Our teams can cover your R&D regarding:

Innovation requires real problems to be solved with ingenious solutions. Perhaps your company knows what it wants to do but is unsure of how to do it. We specialize in helping companies achieve their digital transformation goals.

After working for different industries we’ve deve- loped a series of software components that let us be agile and efficient. We’re also flexible regarding the Intellectual Property of these projects: we can work as a joint venture, or your company can keep the rights to what is developed.
Working with Yuxi means that you get more than just a team behind.

We work while you work. Our prime location –6 months on EST & 6 on CST– empowers synergies and communications. Collaboration is facilitated by Medellín’s proximity to the U.S. –direct flights to and from NY, Miami & Boston– and our U.S. based office.

We share a western culture and mentality. We are proactive, responsible, and known for our attitude and charisma. If our teams think something you do can be improved they will let you know and provide alternatives. We are bilingual –English and Spanish– and work 45 hours a week. We are not working for you, we are working with you!

We stay up to date with the most modern technologies and practices. Our teams are versatile, adaptable, and have expertise in a wide range of programming languages, databases, and frameworks. Our projects run under Agile and traditional methodologies and are supported by our UX/UI, QA and DevOps practices. Our solutions accommodate to your needs, not otherwise.

Yuxi Global (called Yuxi Pacific at the time) was founded in 2005 in Pennsylvania, USA, by the entre- preneur Michael Puscar. In 2011 we opened a small office in Medellín, Colombia for research & deve- lopment and were surprised by the quality of the local talent. Our sales and employee numbers began doubling each year and since all our operations were moved to Medellín.

In 2013 the company was acquired by Blue Loop Capital, an investment firm from USA owned by a single stakeholder, the serial entrepreneur, inventor, and investor Kent Savage. In 2016 we rebranded ourselves as Yuxi Global, adopting a more modern image which reflects the maturity we’ve reached and our capability of tackling challenges from all over the world.
We are here to help you
What kind of help do you need?
Do you want to work with Yuxi?
YOU ARE CONTACTING THE SALES TEAM.
*By clicking Submit, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.
YOU ARE CONTACTING THE INFORMATION TEAM.

Having a good work environment is having happy employees. This accounts for both location and ambience: Yuxians have access to free fruit, cereals, coffee, and snacks. We host activities like guided active pauses and monthly massages. Our offices are spaces designed to be both comfortable and inspiring, letting creativity flow freely.

A strong and comprehensive benefits package goes a long way. Our employees can mix and match between benefits like gym memberships,premium healthcare, vehicle insurance, savings programs, food or gas passes, education aids, etc.

You don’t only work to live: life also happens inside the office. For many years society has thought that work is a hindrance that stops us from living our actual life, something so drudging that you actually get paid for it. It’s time to change that: #YuxiLife is our way of creating conditions where people can feel happy, encouraged, and motivated about going to work. #YuxiLife is, more than a lifestyle, our workstyle.
These are the Yuxians we’re currently looking for. However, if your profile is different from this or you’d like to ask about other positions, feel free to send us an e-mail to:
